markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You can use High Jump and Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don’t perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don’t Stride 10 feet).
name: Quick Jump

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Quick Jump Source Core Rulebook pg. 264 4.0 Prerequisites Trained in Athletics --- You can use High Jump and Long Jump as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don’t perform the initial Stride (nor do you fail if you don’t Stride 10 feet).
